data_modeling_governance.title: How Can Domain-Driven Design and Hexagonal Architecture Improve Data Product Development in Practice?
data_modeling_governance.summary: Building robust data products means more than just pipelines. It’s about treating data as a real product with data contracts, quality rules, and clearly defined data transformations. This article explores how Domain-Driven Design and hexagonal architecture can bring structure and trust to your data engineering with clear segmentation of concerns.
